attributes.action: Make all banks and building society's pass on immediately any interest reductions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any interest rate cut should be passed on to all borrowers, whether business or residential.

The economy will not recover if it is only the banks that continue to benefit from the interest rate cuts.  There is no point in the Bank of England reducing interest rates if it is not passed on.  Banks and Building Society's will cut rates paid on savings, they should be forced to do the same for mortgages and loans NOW.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
